title: Decommission an Old Asset
description: A piece of equipment is being replaced and needs to be formally decommissioned in the asset management system.

tasks.description: Find the asset record in the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the record for the machine to be decommissioned.

tasks.description: Cancel all future scheduled PMs for the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully removes all pending PM work orders for the asset.

tasks.description: Change the asset's status to 'Decommissioned' or 'Retired'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status, removing it from the active asset list.
